title: Antifungal profile and mechanism of bioinspired nanoscale magnesium against the agriculturally important pathogen Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. niveum
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,4279-4292
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00548A, Paper
Muhammad Noman, Temoor Ahmed, Mohammad Shafiqul Islam, Mudassar Ahmad, Jing Wang, Yingying Cai, Zhongna Hao, Hayssam M. Ali, Zhen Zhang, Yanli Wang, Bin Li, Jiaoyu Wang
Biogenic MgNPs suppress watermelon Fusarium wilt, caused by Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. niveum (Fon), through precisly targeting peroxin biogenesis-centered signaling events in Fon.
